executeJobForUser(String, Integer) - Method in class com.sarala.mm.job.executor.JobExecutor
Returns final JobStatus object that holds Atomic: read and create job lock the runningJobsMap to get the current status of a JobId if the job is currently running , return the JobStatus with userName whos is currently running the job if the there is no job currently running with the @param jobId, create a new Job with the @param jobId add the newly created job to the runningJobsMap unlock runningJobsMap Execute Job Get result from startJobAndWaitForResult(CallableJob) Atomic write to runningJobsMap get the final JobStatus that holds the result, userName and currentState of the job
